title: NEW FORMULA AND HAS 50% LESS ZINC THAN BEFORE

It had gone from 30mg/200% DV to 15mg/100% DV. Nevertheless I was very disappointed. I love the product, but felt it was not right to reduce any percentage of the MAIN ingredient without alerting consumer. In this case, I think a 50% reduction would warrant some kind of new formulation statement.

title: NOT  gluten free

After being diagnosed with celiac disease, I read the label on the bottle and found that it contains wheat "Contains: Fermented soy and fermented wheat (as food source for Saccharomyces cerevisiae". I am going to switch to another brand and see if I can return my unopened bottle to Amazon. I no longer have the box, so I can't be sure if the gluten free claim was made by Amazon or NewChapter. But it clearly claims to be "NATURALLY GLUTEN FREE" IN Amazon's ad.

title: Effective and does not cause nausea like most Zinc supplements
body: I have a Zinc deficiency so I have to take these tablets daily for the rest of my life. The exact name of this disorder is called Acrodermatitis Enteropathica and it's a genetic autoimmune disorder that affects very few people and requires very specific genetics to line up. I spent my whole life taking other forms of Zinc pills which only caused major nausea and stomach discomfort as Zinc is very heavy and hard on the stomach, especially taken on an empty stomach. I was searching for a Zinc supplement that was designed to ease my nausea after 20 minutes when it kicks in. This product has never caused nausea and as a result I can take my full daily dose instead of dreading having to take it in fear that I haven't eaten a significant enough amount of food so to avoid nausea (in which case the Zinc and the food just comes back up on you). It's a very very awful disorder and there's nothing that can be done besides taking 1mg per weight of Zinc a day (meaning if you're 150 pounds, you need to take 150mgs of Zinc per day) that's if you have this disorder which is just slightly different than Zinc disorder but it's easier to say and explain Zinc deficiency (which can be inherited in adulthood if you're an alcoholic as alcohol eats up Zinc in the body). As long as I take this Zinc, I'm okay and living normally. But if I miss a entire week of Zinc - the symptoms begin to appear and as long as I take it again, it goes into remission. The symptoms include dermatitis, scaly patches of itchy rash on extremities (Enteropathica means extremities like legs, feet, arms, head, scalp, etc) and some other symptoms include mouth soars. It's very painful when it's been out of the system too long like weeks of not taking. I realize this is a review of this product and so I am also sharing this disorder as well for those who may need to know more about it as the disorder is rare and I hope this info finds someone who's been running from doctor to doctor to get help for their child (it begins to show itself a few weeks after the child is born or weaned off mothers milk as breast milk has Zinc and symptoms won't show up on the person until breast milk is weaned). This product for those taking it for other reasons is highly effective as I have the disorder and if it didn't work it would show my symptoms and it has never ever even on an empty stomach given me nausea.

title: Wonderful Supplement
body: I highly recommend this product for anyone who suffers from stomach pain and heartburn. I had an endoscopy performed and I was diagnosed with hiatal hernia. I was prescribed many different antacids that did not alleviate the heartburn and stomach pain but added additional discomfort due to the side effects. I have tried almost everything. I have tried antacids over the counter and prescribed medicine and many supplements (mastic gum, manuka honey, colostrum, DGL, apple cider to name a few). I had instant relief, this supplement started working within 5 days and I had an acute case of GI problems. I was suffering so much due to heartburn and I could not eat anything due to pain. I am so thankful to my chiropractor, God sent, who recommended this product.

title: My cure for melasma
body: I cannot praise this supplement more highly. For the last 10 years, I have been suffering from a condition called melasma, which is hyperpigmentation of the skin. I've been suffering with some GI issues for the past 2 years or so, and during this time I found out that I have leaky gut (I did a test for it). It still took me awhile to connect the dots and realize that it was the leaky gut (which began after a heavy round of Accutane 10 years earlier!) was what was causing my melasma. I tried glutamine and colostrum to heal my gut, and maybe they did some good, but it wasn't until I added in this supplement almost 3 months ago that I began to see clear patches of skin breaking through the pigmented spots (which at this point cover both cheeks and both sides of my forehead). I know that this supplement is healing my gut, because I can actually see it mirrored in my skin. It's pricey for a month's supply, but it is the only thing that has ever made this much of a difference. There may be other brands of zinc carnosine that are cheaper and maybe they're just as effective, but I don't even want to chance it and lose any time that I could be spent continuing to heal.

title: FINALLY!
body: Okay, so I have had gastritis for the past 8 months. I've been to 3 doctors, tried H-2 blockers, PPIs, done strict diets for several months, tried all kinds of herbs and supplements and had an endoscopy that confirmed gastritis and some bile reflux. Then I read several articles on Zinc-Carnosine and it's effect on healing gastritis and ulcers. I originally started out with the Doctor's Best Pepzin GI and took that (2 pills 2x a day) for a month along with Thorne Research GI-Encap (2 capsules 3x a day). I was seeing some improvements, but not 100% like I was hoping. After I finished the bottle, I bought Zinlori 75 and began taking it about a week ago (1 pill 2x a day). I would say my symptoms (daily epigastric pain, gas, bloating, all around general stomach discomfort) are 95% gone. I still get some gas here and there, but it's most likely because I still drink quite a bit of coffee throughout the day. The epigastric pain, which was the worst part of it all, has totally disappeared! I can FINALLY say that I found something that worked for me! I plan to take this entire bottle and then see how I feel. Hopefully this will do the trick and I won't have to buy another because it's preeetty pricey!

title: a zinc-carnosine compound that was recommended to us by several health practitioners that is supposed ...
body: Zinlori is a very important supplement, a zinc-carnosine compound that was recommended to us by several health practitioners that is supposed to help in healing the gut and alleviate stomach discomfort.  It is supposed to help your body's natural defenses and with the integrity of the stomach lining.  Since it is late at night when posting this I won't comment extensively other than to shift gears slightly and say that anyone dealing with stomach and digestive issues and auto-immune diseases should research extensively a condition called "leaky gut" which is the breakdown of the gut lining leading to food particles getting into your bloodstream, causing the body's immune system to attack the food particles, leading to numerous allergies and over time auto immune diseases as the body attacks itself not recognizing the food you eat as normal and healthy.  Parasitic infections can also be associated with these health issues.  There are protocols for treatment of these conditions.  Zinlori is one of the numerous supplements that can help and it is a good one.

title: Zinc 15 mg can help foods not taste "bad" for the picky eater
body: My young, autistic, picky-eater son is able to drink this straight (on a full stomach).  I've tried it myself and it does taste good.  I started him on 15 mg of zinc per day when I learned that picky eaters are often zinc deficient which results in foods tasting and smelling "bad".  Adding zinc is not a cure for picky eating.  However, my hope is that if I can fix the "bad" taste and smell for him, then the food therapy we are starting will merely be an uphill climb instead of the impossible uphill battle it currently is.  I plan to keep using this until his doctors and/or nutritionist tell me we can stop.

title: Worth the few extra bucks
body: Thorne makes quality supplements and this is no exception. I feel confident in the safety of taking these and giving them to my children as well. I feel our health and immunity is greatly improved with this formulation. I switched brands once and soon saw the sings of zinc deficiency (white spots on my nails) after taking the other brand. I switched back to these and they soon disappeared. They have never upset our stomachs, even when taken without food (I take them at bedtime) and have never affected our appetites either. These are definitely worth the few extra dollars.

title: Clear skin, better sleep, and no nausea
body: I avoided zinc capsules for a long time because I was told they don't absorb as well. However, as I am doing a protocol to lower my copper levels, I wanted a lower dose of zinc than lozenges had and didn't want all the sugar additives. I'd often get nauseous with lozenges too, and sometimes throwing up no matter when I took them.

title: Helps prevent colds
body: Apparently vitamin C is not the only thing that helps prevent colds. Zinc, when taken at a slightly higher dosage (at least 25 to 30 mg for us) everyday, can be just as effective against colds. I tried the test, and I did not come down with a bad cold this past winter, neither did my daughter. However, my husband came down with a cold and was sick as a dog (had to take three days off from work), thanks to all his co-workers coming to work sick. He did not feel that taking Zinc would help him, and that was the result. I especially like this brand of zinc, and will continue to purchase it here.

title: Nice product!
body: With celiac disease, homozygous MTHFR variant (C677T), and multiple allergies, I have historically had all of the symptoms of zinc deficiency. With dietary correction, my health has improved immensely. I now have none of the symptoms of this deficiency, but I want it to stay that way! This seems to be a good, high quality product suitable for daily use.

title: Amazing for autism, acne, anxiety and immune system
body: I buy this for my children that have Autism. If you have a child with SPD, Aspergers or want to boost your immune system, this is THE best brand. Start with the lowest dose and work your way up slowly. This helps picky eaters treamdously. It helps your skin, it helps the immune system, nervous system. Do the research. My son was looking like a skeleton because he couldn't eat. His mind wouldn't let him. Now he is up to eating 10 different types of foods. He will even try foods and even if he turns it down it's a success. My daughters skin has cleared up so much since starting zinc! We stopped all prescription meds. It's amazing. You can not just buy ANY Zinc either. It has to be Zinc Pic! My son started gaining weight without 2 weeks of starting this. He has ADHD also.

title: Cured my Erectile Dysfunction
body: I couldn't understand what was wrong with me. Here I am, a perfectly healthy young male, and recently I couldn't get my little buddy up anymore. After I started taking this produc, I noticed in a few days that I started having rock hard erections with my girlfriend. I love this stuff. Apparently it's one of the best supplements for male performance. I'm guessing I wasn't getting enough in my food.

title: Good Bio-available Zinc in Picolinate Form - No Upset Stomach for Me
body: A really quality product with one of the most bio-available forms of Zinc - Picolinate.  Also, all other zinc supplements I have taken over the years have upset my stomach; however, zinc is such a vital and important mineral.  It helps to metabolize many vitamins and is essential (along with Selenium) in keeping your thyroid healthy.  Zinc is also one of the best way to regulate hormones.  Many people are zinc deficient and don't know it.  There are many symptoms of zinc deficiency - even if just a mild deficiency.  Some people need more than other, especially those who are trying to heal a "leaky gut" as one of zinc's important functions is in healing tissues - including the gut.  Just be sure that you are getting adequate copper in your diet or with a supplement when taking zinc supplements, as zinc depletes copper in the body, and copper deficiency comes with a whole set of symptoms of it's own.  Please feel free to ask me questions about my experience with this product, or leave a comment.

title: Good product at a fair price
body: I normally order Liquid Zinc Assay from another seller here on Amazon but this last time around they were all out of stock so I decided to try Good State-Liquid Ionic Zinc. Overall it seems like a good product sold by a quality company. The product arrived quickly and so far has seemed to work fine(if work is the correct term). The taste is similar to other zinc products i have used as supplements and the price seems very fair. The only small annoyance I have found is that a chunky white residue quickly builds up on the outside of the container after pouring. While this is true of other zinc products I have never seen it happen to this magnitude before. Perhaps it is because this product is more zinc per ml which I suppose means more bang for your buck. While it's not a deal-breaker at all it is rather gross looking to have this large white growth looking thing hanging off the bottle, but again, as far as actually using the product everything seems great and this bottle will last me a long time. If you don't mind rubbing the bottle down with a clean rag every few days you should not have a problem with the outer build-up. In summary, good product and fair price

title: Our pediatrician recommended this for our son who is undermethylized
body: Our pediatrician recommended this for our son who is undermethylized.  I was about to re-order a second bottle when I read the review about the taste being an indicator of how much zinc your body actually needs.  When we started the treatment his zinc level was much lower than his copper level, these need to be close to the same.  Toward the end of the bottle he really began fighting us to take it and saying that he could taste it in the juice.  I will have his zinc level tested again before continuing with the second dose.  I think that is a good sign that his body was able to absorb the zinc which is what we needed.

title: Help for the common cold??
body: I bought this awhile ago as I was trying many different things to fight my psoriasis.  I had forgotten that I had it after having moved on to try other remedies.  Well, I started to catch a cold a few weeks ago, one that had been going around the office that was pretty bad.  I was also just getting ready to go on vacation as well.  Perfect timing.  Family members both told me to try some Zinc.  I googled zinc and colds and lo and behold, there are studies that say Zinc helps when you are sick.  I remembered this bottle I bought and took about a cap full.  I kid you not, within 10 minutes I was actually feeling better!  My throat stopped burning.  The feeling of being sick faded.  I couldn't believe it.  The latest studies indicate that taking Zinc in the early stages of a cold cuts the time of being sick in half and I can attest to it.  Almost everyone that caught this bug at work came down with bronchitis, had to see the doctor, and had to get a prescription.  I DID NOT!  Seven weeks later a few at work are still trying to get over this bug!

title: Resolved my hypothyroid problem & now I hardly get sick
body: I was diagnosed with subclinical hypothyroidism 5 years ago and, after several months of taking levothyroxine, even though it got my TSH and T4 back to normal, I did not like the dyspnea side effect of levothyroxine when I went running.  I avoid prescription medications whenever possible, anyway, so I researched non-pharmaceutical support for my disorder.  I learned that zinc is an essential mineral often lacking in hypothyroid individuals.  I also discovered that its metabolite, monomethionine, is more bioavailable and potent than other forms of zinc, and this demonstrated itself also in how I felt.

title: Very good for one's immune system
body: This is the most bioavailable form of zinc. Apparently bodybuilders use it to increase testosterone, but the rest of us can use it to boost our immune systems (the zinc), along with giving our livers a helping hand (the methionine). It's also manufactured without any yeast, dairy, egg, gluten, corn, soy, wheat, sugar, salt, starch, preservatives, artificial color, artificial flavor, or fragrance.

title: Surprised to find it helps very well with sleep problems!
body: I have an illness that impacts my sleep. It had become very bad and I had inverted sleep, or sleep reversal for over two years. Nothing I tried or the doctor did helped. In fact, my doctor started treated mr like I wasn't really "trying" or following directions. I started taking the zinc monomethionine by accident last January and within a week, first I had two days in a row of solid sleep. I have had unrefeshing sleep the entirety of my illness, almost nine years now. Then I started to be able to go to sleep at two or three am and wake up at 8 or 9 am. It was the only change I made: starting the zinc monomethionine. (Before I could not fall to sleep no matter how good my sleep hygiene was until 5 to 8 am and wake up at 3-5 pm in the afternoon. This really screws up your life! I'd have to stay up and not sleep so I could make appointments and such, and then my illness would worsen terribly. The zinc has held up 10 months later. When I run out, and I miss it for a while my sleep gets all screwy again. No one ever mentioned zinc monomethionine for sleep to me, not even my complementary medicine MD. So I want to pass this on for those who have tried everything and still can't fix their sleep. If you google "zinc and sleep" information comes up, but not the reverse: zinc doesn't show up on searches for help for sleep...

I decided to try optizinc on a whim because I head that zinc helps to heal skin, so I wanted to try it for my acne scars. title: Your body requires the mineral Zinc for the synthesis of collagen!
body: I have been using OptiZinc for years but I bought another brand recently and had to use that up, now I am back on track. If you are Zinc deficient you can easily tell by looking at your finger and toe nails. If they are brittle and break easily you may be zinc deficient. The body requires the mineral Zinc for the synthesis of collagen. Collagen is in your hair, skin, nails etc. it is necessary in order for wounds to heal properly. It also has antibiotic properties when dealing with colds. Now that I am back with my regular zinc, I do not need to try another brand because, this is my preferred brand!

title: Much more potent and efficient than nowfoods..tastes like fish food
body: If you are buying any other brand of zinc, there is simply no comparison. Maybe because most other brands are chelated zinc or some other type? Whatever the case, these optizinc monomethionine variety are night and day. I was taking the NOWfoods brand for years because it was the cheapest option online and had decent enough reviews. Optizinc completely outclasses those pills for two simple reasons; one Optizinc tablet seems to be much more potent than 2-3 of the other brand and two; nowhere near the same amount of stomach discomfort as other brands. So far I have felt no uncomfortable burning feeling in my stomach even one time. With other brands sometimes, even after eating, I would still get a faint sort of queasy unpleasantness. Not with these. All of the traditional benefits of zinc, boosted libido, immune etc are more pronounced and stronger with optizinc. Since switching to these, its like taking zinc in a whole new way. They taste odd, like fish food or something similar. But its worth it.

title: Unexpected Improvement With Acne
body: I came upon this product after seeing rave reviews about how it can help with hormonal/cystic acne. I noticed a difference within just the first week of use. Faster than I expected! I was breaking out along my chin/lower cheeks/jawline. Topical treatments didn't seem to be working, so I thought this would help, and it did. The zits I had seemed to heal faster. I even noticed an improvement in the dark marks from more recent healed breakouts. Zinc has a tendency to deplete the body's copper, so I loved that this supplement had copper in it too (one tablet has 30 mg of zinc monomethionine which is 200% DV and 300 mcg of copper sebacate which is 15% DV). Be sure to take it with a substantial meal to avoid nausea. Some may notice an improvement in a short time, but I've heard of others noticing in improvement a month or so later, so give it some time. I wouldn't take more than the RDV without talking to a doctor first.

title: not for me
body: The product seems to work.  After taking this product I developed a shortness of breath that made it impossible to continue.  I am not sure what the issue was.  However I do believe that I have excess copper in my system and developed a rash while taking this product.  This is a symptom of copper detox and a tightness in my throat.  I just started taking Solgar 22mgs of just Zinc and feel this is better for my condition.  For the reader I would like to mention some info I found on Zinc in determining my need for it.  Zinc increases melatonin levels which the thyroid secretes (I thought it was just the pineal), I felt that I had a reaction to the combination of melatonin and optizinc so I stopped taking melatonin (zinc also metabolizes melatonin too).  This was found in a pubmed article.  Also I have read contrary information as far as dosage.  One source states that there is or can be up to 1.2-1.5 grams stored in the body at once while another site claimed that only a week of supplementing with 20mgs of zinc is enough to restore a persons levels.  The ratio claims between zinc and copper were also different on Weston Prices website claiming that the ideal zinc to copper ratio is closer to 8 to 1 zinc to copper.  I lean toward Dr Price in this matter considering the overreaching benefits of zinc.  The research I have done on heavy metal toxicity indicates that we are living in a copper rich environment as is and the copper with this zinc maybe unnecessary.  Cheers

title: not for me
body: The product seems to work.  After taking this product I developed a shortness of breath that made it impossible to continue.  I am not sure what the issue was.  However I do believe that I have excess copper in my system and developed a rash while taking this product.  This is a symptom of copper detox and a tightness in my throat.  I just started taking Solgar 22mgs of just Zinc and feel this is better for my condition.  For the reader I would like to mention some info I found on Zinc in determining my need for it.  Zinc increases melatonin levels which the thyroid secretes (I thought it was just the pineal), I felt that I had a reaction to the combination of melatonin and optizinc so I stopped taking melatonin (zinc also metabolizes melatonin too).  This was found in a pubmed article.  Also I have read contrary information as far as dosage.  One source states that there is or can be up to 1.2-1.5 grams stored in the body at once while another site claimed that only a week of supplementing with 20mgs of zinc is enough to restore a persons levels.  The ratio claims between zinc and copper were also different on Weston Prices website claiming that the ideal zinc to copper ratio is closer to 8 to 1 zinc to copper.  I lean toward Dr Price in this matter considering the overreaching benefits of zinc.  The research I have done on heavy metal toxicity indicates that we are living in a copper rich environment as is and the copper with this zinc maybe unnecessary.  Cheers

title: best zinc ever - great hangover cure too!
body: I love megafood brand, all their stuff is amazing. I know this is not the intended use, but I use this product before I go out with friends. As we get older, our liver doesn't produce as much of the enzyme necessary to process alcohol, and zinc increases production of that enzyme. I will eat 3 or 4 of these before I go out and when I come home, I swear I don't have hangovers anymore. I'm late twenties and noticed a marked difficulty in having even a glass of wine or two at dinner compared to when I was 22. Now if I have zinc before I drink, I feel great the next day. Highly recommend.

title: best zinc--beware of zinc & copper combos
body: If you have MTHFR or other genetic defects you might actually be overloaded with copper. I was religiously taking a "zinc supplement" and couldn't figure out why I was not gaining ground. AHA, it's because most of them have copper as well for "balance." If you are loaded to the gills with copper (and good luck getting a doctor to check you for that!) you'll just get sicker. This is a food sourced zinc, not ROCK sourced and very easy on the gut. Recommended by me, a slowly recovering from long illness person.

title: Highly Recommend MegaFood Supplements
body: This is absolutely the BEST Zinc supplement out there in my opinion. I was recommended this brand by 2 different friends (who happen to be 1. a dietitian & R.N. and 2. a nutritionist) after explaining that I typically have profound nausea on most Zinc supplements. This is the FIRST Zinc supplement I have ever been on that has caused me no ill effects. I have zero upset stomach when I take this at all. This company also packages its product like no other that I've seen! Their supplements come in brown glass containers to help protect the contents from and are thoroughly packaged in biodegradable boxes with packaging inside the box to make sure the bottle does not slip around. Extremely impressed with all of the products I've received from them.

In addition to this, I cut out all processed sugar out of my diet (including high sugar fruit), went semi-low carb and avoided all gluten and dairy. After taking this for 2 months, I feel as though I am not as allergic to gluten and dairy as I was before starting this zinc supplement. An added bonus is that I have not gotten sick this whole winter, not even a cold - I work at a college and I'm surrounded by viruses and bacteria all day long! It also does not upset my stomach. Highly recommended!

title: Quality source of Zinc delivered through food complex which removes nausea - Zinc deficient user amazing results!
body: I was born with a Zinc deficiency that is a autoimmune genetic disorder which causes my body to lack the gene in its DNA to absorb Zinc through food only. It's called Acrodermetitis Enteropathica. Basically it means I will begin to see Dermatitis like lesions and rough dry skin bumps / rashes on my extremities over time of missing my Zinc supplements. This is a rare disorder, so imagine how absolutely happy I was to find a product that I have to take to live that didn't make my stomach nauseous. Unlike some Zinc supplement users, I actually will die a slow and uncomfortably painful death by missing on Zinc supplementation for say more than a few months - 6+ months of 0 Zinc is imminently fatal for someone with this disorder. I spent my entire life looking for different Zinc supplements that wouldn't cause nausea. I use to have to eat a lot of heavy food to be able to keep down a Zinc pill until I found this life changing produce. See, if I don't take my Zinc, I break out into Dermatitis rashes. It does downhill from there. Yes, I've once left for a trip and thought I packed my Zinc only to find I would go 4 days without. I started to have little signs that a break out was coming. I went back on track in taking my supplement and I'm back to normal after getting my levels back up. I spent months in the hospital as a baby on the verge of death until doctors finally found the problem. I spent my childhood being fed Zinc through crushed up Zinc pills by my parents because upon them trying to give me a oral Zinc pill I would run off saying it makes my tummy hurt. I struggled until I found this supplement which I consider a life changing supplement because I now can take it on an empty stomach and not worry. And because my body doesn't retain Zinc in any other forms but supplementation, I have to take the same amount of Zinc as my body weight a day. So this product changed my life and made it easier, safer, better for me to keep Zinc levels up. This works because someone like me who doesn't produce or keep Zinc levels in her body has to take it and sees a difference. I don't know what I'd do without it but have to go back to other varieties of Zinc supplements, which would lower the quality of my life and cause me great nausea. If the Zinc comes back up on me it's like not even taking it. And the cost being a little higher is simply because it's all quality products harvested seasonally and kept up to the best standards. If you don't have to take this to save your life you don't have the same sense of appreciation for it. Enjoy eating Zinc enriched foods that your body actually absorbs into itself because I was born with DNA that lacks that ability and now have to spend the rest of my life until death supplementing with Zinc. This is the ONLY product that has provided me with a good source of Zinc in which the food complex portion of it has eliminated the stomach turning sour nausea type of feeling Zinc without these additives causes.

title: Go Away Acne Inflammation!!!!!
body: Thank you so much! This product came within about a week and there was no hassle whatsoever. Bottle was New and in factory packaging. I have started taking this product as I heard it can have a very positive effect when it comes to fighting inflammation caused by acne---In my case, adult acne. I have been fighting hormonal cystic acne from 28-32 (presently) and with a combination of the wonder cleanser "Hibiclens" and extremely light moisturizers, things are showing improvement. I am only JUST realizing I have rosacea for the first time because I have finally been given the chance to step back and realize much of the redness is also from my own skin's natural inflammation. Zinc has been tested and (apparently) proven to work really well in fighting the bacteria that causes this specific inflammation, so hopefully this will be one more step into what I hope is recovery! Normally I don't take too many supplements, but I also have PCOS, so I have heard many names pop up here and there. Zinc, Folic Acid, B-12 and D/D-3 have always been quite popular!!!

I can drive etc.  I also take another supplement recommended by my Dr. that does not have zinc in it.  Zinc is also a supplement that I give my 87 year old husband with moderate Alzheimer's.  It is one of many.  He seems to have leveled off in his disease progression, but I cannot pin-point a particular supplement.

title: Yummy and so good for you
body: I had given up on finding a zinc lozenge that didn't taste like chalk. This one doesn't!! The taste is a sheer delight. It chews up nicely and the peach-raspberry has a lovely, fresh zing to it. NOTE: Please do read the directions on the bottle. You shouldn't chew one of these on an empty stomach. I believe it says so on the bottle. I did it once by mistake and was nauseous for half the day. Eat a little something and then consume your lozenge. Also, remember to wait 30 minutes between consuming zinc and eating/drinking citrus. I don't remember if the bottle says that, but this is pretty standard with zinc lozenges.

title: Great Tasting Daily Zinc Lozenge
body: These Zinc lozenges taste great and they come in the perfect dosage for a daily dose.  They're chewable, which is my preference, since I hate swallowing pills.  The bottle is quite large so it lasts for awhile.  I love zinc because it protects me against getting the cold or flu -- I can't even remember the last time I was sick!!  These also do not make me upset to my stomach, which other zinc supplements have done in the past -- even made me throw up.  But not this one.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good zinc supplement.

title: Very Tasty

title: On my way to curing my ulcer!!

For two months I have been taking Jarrow's mastic gum, and for one month the Swanson's zinc carnosine, what I call the magic bullet.  Since these are natural products, there are no side effects (except relief from stomach pain) and the healing is a bit slow, but steady and constant.  If you have ulcers, get these products.  If you have ulcers, you are probably at your wits' end with restricted eating and pain, pain, pain.  I'm not a medical professional and this is only a personal recommendation, but this is the only way I've found to actually cure the problem, as nothing else seemed to work and doctors seem to want to slap a Band-Aid on the symptoms and not actually heal.  I'm not out of the woods yet but I see improvement every day.  I can't tell you how amazing it is to eat things that in the past would make me think, "Oh, I'm going to pay for this later."  Best of luck to all you ulcer sufferers out there with these products.  Just be patient and let them go to work.  H pylori is a nasty, sneaky bug that doesn't give up easily, but it can be beat.  I did and I hope you do too.  Thanks, amazon, for these incredible, inexpensive products that can help a lot of people.

Sometimes for several weeks, other times for only a few days. After some simple research you can find that these and a few others are very common for people taking this type of drug. This product does not have it, and as a result I get more of the zinc. I actually takes the powder in very small amounts, since it is more concentrated.  The smaller size package I have (100mg) will last me a very long time, and it opens and closes with a zipper very nicely.  One suggestion for the manufacturer is to insure the package zipper is closed after packing.  When it arrives in the mail, you find some zinc in the upper portion above the zipper, and have to make sure to get it all down into the package before cutting the seal off. Outstanding way to get zinc without stearate!!

title: Pleasantly surprised!
body: Ok I have severe acne - the type where you don't just get pimples, I get painful lil nodules under the skin (concentrated on and around my forehead) that take forever to reach the surface and like to leave scars (even if you don't pop them!). I have used a number of prescription creams and pills. I've even tried that little zapit machine which did nothing for my severe acne. I did find success with a prescription antibiotic however i stopped taking it after 2 years because I didn't want to be come immune to it. I came across this product and saw the reviews - I figured for $8 bucks it was worth a shot. I ordered on December 8, 2011 and am writing this  review on January 12, 2012. I am happy to report that my acne outbreaks (which occur weekly like clockwork!) have greatly subsided! I noticed that my pimples/nodules were less and less frequent within a couple weeks of taking this, yet they still appeared. So I wasn't quite ready to claim success just yet. But now after a month, I've completed my first bump-free week and I feel like I'm ready to go run around naked in the snow! Now to be fair: I do wash my face with an organic tea-tree oil face wash, and I do use tea-tree oil on my face - but I've done that for months prior to the pills and continue to use them to this day (it definitely works to clean the skin)... So needless to say I'm very pleased with this product. For the customer who complained about having to take pills daily - that's just going to be a part of life dude. I'd rather be taking a zinc supplement like this (which zinc is also recommended to treat a cold and boost your immune system)then take an expensive prescription whose list of side-effects contains "THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE" (WTF?!).. You may also need to change some of your habits/behaviors if you're going to truly take your skin-care seriously. Watch out for coffee - cleanse your face at least 2x per day - use sun-screen - use moisturizer (preferably oil-free) - don't touch your face (period! i struggle with this one) - watch your food intake.. the more grease/oil you put in, the more that could potentially come out your face - reduce stress - and don't worry about the acne - look in the mirror and tell yourself "I AM PHOTOGENIC" daily (and believe it) you'll feel much better off....

title: I saw a huge difference after a week.
body: I have struggled with acne on and off for a long time.  I was finally fed up and looking for a solution that would work consistently when I stumbled on Zinc deficiencies being a possible cause of poor complexion.  I decided to get this as well as some Pantothenic Acid, and start taking them every day.  I am SO glad that I stumbled on this! My skin is clear for the first time in over a decade and it is all due to taking these vitamins.  I have not changed anything else in my lifestyle.  I stopped taking them for about a week, and the acne came back, so it is really helping.

title: Do your research.
body: I am a 31 year old bi-racial woman. I suffer from cystic acne which is hormonal for me. I bought this product because of the reviews. I have only taken one pill on two separate occasions. My plan is to take one pill a week. I became a little hesitant to take everyday at full strength because I read that Zinc can build up in the body and possibly cause problems and make the acne worse. I definitely do not want that. So I figured one pill weekly could help. I have been fine so far. I take this in addition to Acnetame and my acne is subsiding.

title: For my acne

And so far it's cleared up an amazing amount I have maybe one break out currently. I can't say it's the zink or the vitamin A or the doxy since I'm taking all of thee above BUT I am satisfied not gleaming with joy but satisfied with my current results

title: Ahhh. Definitely a winner!
body: I am a 32 year old woman with combination skin and have tried a ton of things to get rid of acne.  Birth control, spironolactone, various face washes, topical creams, etc.  Even removed dairy from my diet and went completely vegan. Nothing worked. :(  I'm into holistic eating, so I began to research natural ways to prevent acne. I learned that  zinc deficiency can contribute to acne, which prompted me to buy these pills. I can say that after about a week of consistently taking them, I have experienced no acne. Not even during my menstrual cycle.  Before the pills, I was getting at least two or three new pimples a week.  Small as well as the deep, red painful ones. I am so relieved to come across these pills!  I tested its impact by stopping taking them for four days and sure enough a pimple popped up.  Began taking them consistently again, and have had no issues.  Now I'm just working on getting an even complexion since I have a few scars from past acne.  Of course, each person's body responds in its own unique way to all things tried, but I can smilingly say that this works for me.  I'm so relieved to find it and not have to walk around with a clear complexion or rely on hormonal medication.  Good luck! :)

I have mild acne associated with hormones so in my opinion, depending on the person, this works for people who do not have cystic acne as well. title: Very helpful and quick!
body: Cleared my skin up almost immediately. Also seems to have restored my energy and appetite...apparently I've been zinc deficient for months. Got this in the mail and was back to normal in a matter of hours. Best way to take these is to eat a meal and take only one tablet. Take the second tablet after another meal several hours later. Your body will pretty much piss away extra stuff it doesn't need so if you take both at the same time you're wasting a pill and more likely to suffer the side effects of a 'zinc overdose' which include abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting. The label says to take two tablets per day which may be why so many of these reviews say that this made them sick. Take two a day but at different times and you may have better luck.

title: Pretty impressive..
body: I used to take zinc picolinate since I've read online how, apparently, your body absorbs it the best out of all the forms of zinc. However,  it didn't do a damn thing for me! Since i know i take  care of my skin perfectly in a textbook manner, yet i still get obnoxious hormonal cystic bumps every month,  I still wanted to take a chance to try some sort of internal supplement. It's disheartening when you keep your skin super clean and moisturized, and you still get huge bumps. So I see that this product is "for acne"..and thought..hell, it doesn't hurt to take some vitamin a,  c, e, b6. I've been taking this zinc gluconate blend for about 2 or 3 weeks now.. keep in mind, my cleansing, moisturizing, and makeup routines have NOT changed..yet my face has been looking really good lately. I have two tiny bumps on my face right now, when I'd normally see about 6 or more. Keep in mind, I'm addicted to coffee and dairy..big acne no no's.. I have not changed my diet though. Therefore, I've come to the conclusion that this supplement works! Just so y'all know, I'm not trying to help sell this product, lol. (I know what you're thinking! Haha) I'm just a bit surprised about my skin, that's all.

title: Cured my acne problem!
body: I've had this annoyingly embarrassing and persistent acne problem for the past 2 years where I would wake up each morning and count 3-10 white heads. My skin was so oily and no typical acne cleansing product off the counter would fix it! Benzoyl Peroxide helped a little at first and made it worse. Clearasil face wash somewhat helped but only on the unaffected parts. Salicylic acid made it MUCH worse. My skin was dry, peeling and I kept breaking out even with moderate use of these treatments. I went so far as to take a raw-food (vegetables, fruits, nuts) detox for a month and that did NOTHING to help my acne. My skin did become less oily though. Cephalexin was later prescribed to me which helped tone down the acne problem, but it came back.

title: It is working for me!!! :)
body: Ok, so I started to really break out really bad  a year ago , I have really oily skin, I have broken out before but never this bad where I was getting the cystic acne instead of just regular acne . I tried everything , but nothing was working topically.  I tried acnefree severe, proactive , noxema , garnier, etc. .... So then I decided to try internal remedies  like drinking green tea , drinking lots of water , eating fruits and vegetables more than the usual , cutting back and not eating dairy , or greasy foods.  I started reading on foods that help rid acne and while reading a couple of blogs and web sites I came across foods that contain zinc , like parsley , spinach , salmon and others on the internet , so I researched on zinc, turns out I'm deficient in this.  I had all the side effects of zinc deficiency. I was tired, was losing my hair, brittle nails, acne, poor wound healing, dandruff etc.  Zinc helps prevent inflammatory wounds , fights bacteria ,fights dandruff , helps out eye function. It helps with vitamin A absorption. It helps with hair loss.  With skin. Colds viruses. There is so much it helps with.  My skin hasn't been as oily as it was before. All my old acne is disappearing , and my skin is smoother.  I have had more confidence lately .  I take this with a GNC multivitamin for woman in my case.  I only take one since my multivitamin has zinc in it as well. I read that you're not supposed to take to much zinc because it can become toxic to the body , it can deplete other nutrients . 30 mg is effective enough.  If you have cystic acne and oily skin, try it!  It wouldn't hurt! My skin is almost clear and I've been using this for 3 weeks now , plus it has other acne fighting vitamins in this zinc for acne supplement! :)

title: So far so good. I've been suffering hormonal acne for about five ...
body: So far so good.  I've been suffering hormonal acne for about five years (since I stopped taking birth control pills).  It finally dawned on me that I should try treating it from the inside out, instead of topically.  I take two of these per day with two Acnetame pills.  I take them with food, and not all together.  When I first started I noticed my stomach would hurt a bit.  Not Bad, but just mildly upset.  So I space them out when I'm eating.  Or sometimes I'll take one for lunch and one for dinner.  I've had a few monthly breakouts, but no cystic acne (which was what I hated).  FYI, my acne wasn't really bad.  Just a few cysts every few months.  I don't know how well it will work if your acne is severe.  I'm very pleased though.  Getting ready to order more so I can make sure I always have it in stock.

title: Fantastic Product
body: I am a long time acne sufferer. At times my face looked so bad I missed class because I was so embarrassed. I know everyone says they've tried everything but I actually mean it. Nothing cleared my face besides medication from my dermatologist, but that stuff is expensive and on a college budget I couldn't afford it. I am almost finished with this bottle and am about to purchase my second. I went from 20+ zits, pimples, white heads, black heads and everything else you can imagine to 5 small pimples. The reason this product worked for me is due to the type of acne I have, which is toxicity acne. I strongly urge you to figure out what specific type of acne you suffer from and treat that. I'm now in the process of evening my skin tone and getting rid of the acne scars which takes time. But I wouldn't be at this point without the Zinc. Great purchase.

title: Miracle, after 8 years of struggle!
body: I have never written a product review before, but I feel really strongly about this product. Like many of the others, I have tried EVERYTHING; antibiotics, retin-a, 10000 different face washes and acne products. Nothing helped- expect the antibiotics, but you cant take them forever because of the side effects.  I have started to having painful acne- big cystic ones that went absolutely crazy during my menstrual cycle-.in my early 30s- I am 38 now. It has caused scarring on my face and actually began to affect me emotionally. I had not even had any issues during puberty and it has sucked to have them as an adult. However, after trying everything possible, I gave up and decided to just accept and love myself with acne or not. One day, reading an article on zinc deficiency, I decided to search products in Amazon and this was the highest rated zinc product. So I ordered it, not really believing that it would work...Oh my God, I am still in shocked that it actually has been working so miraculously!!!! Before I have finished the 1st bottle my face was half way cleared and now, I am half way through my second bottle and my face is almost completely clear. Even my 4 year old nephew noticed it!!!! I do not get big, red cystic ones anymore and I barely get any acne on my face! and my face is healing beautifully!  The only downside of this product is that it could be a little harsh on the tummy, if you have a sensitive stomach like mine. I would recommend this 100%! and I hope that it would work for everyone as well as it has been working for me. Don't give up at least until you finish your 1st bottle. I feel very blessed and thankful.

title: Miracle Acne Vitamin
body: I am a 31 year old female who has had acne for the past twenty years. Growing up it was terribly bad and embarrassing, and none of the prescription creams or antibiotics worked for me. In high school I went on Accutane. It completely cleared up my skin, but 3 years later it started to break out again. Ugh. I then tried various facial products, including ProActiv, which worked for a little while. In my 20's my acne became worst and worst, and I started to develop deep cystic zits. I tried to go on Accutane again, but even at the lowest doses it burned the inside of my nose. It hurt so much I had to give it up. Plus I didn't feel that comfortable taking Accutane for a second time. While researching natural cures I stumbled across this vitamin on Amazon. I figured I would give it a shot. Am I glad I did!! This stuff is amazing! After only 2 weeks my acne was almost completely gone!! I couldn't believe! I wish I had known about it years before. When I use this in addition to a dairy free, low sugar diet, the Exposed system skin care, and fish oil supplements I get maximum results. title: I wish I had known about the wonderful powers of zinc sooner!
body: I've always had a pimple here and there, and I relied for a long time on topical treatments. I never worried too much about it, just shrugged my shoulders, and thought to myself "hey, everyone gets pimples, just a fact of life you gotta deal with." When I turned 26, however, I started to get large, painful cystic acne on my jawline and neck and nothing helped. After a consult with a doctor, they recommended that I take a zinc supplement as a 90% vegetarian, I probably don't have enough zinc in my diet (a quick check on my nail beds confirmed this...if you have horizontal ridges on your nails and you don't eat a lot of meat, then you might have a zinc deficiency). I take two pills every morning, and they've been working wonderfully. I still get the occasional white head here and there (I'm not 100% great at taking off my makeup, so I blame myself for those), but even after a few short weeks, I no longer have the large, painful cystic nodules on my face.

title: Miracle Acne Vitamin
body: I am a 31 year old female who has had acne for the past twenty years. Growing up it was terribly bad and embarrassing, and none of the prescription creams or antibiotics worked for me. In high school I went on Accutane. It completely cleared up my skin, but 3 years later it started to break out again. Ugh. I then tried various facial products, including ProActiv, which worked for a little while. In my 20's my acne became worst and worst, and I started to develop deep cystic zits. I tried to go on Accutane again, but even at the lowest doses it burned the inside of my nose. It hurt so much I had to give it up. Plus I didn't feel that comfortable taking Accutane for a second time. While researching natural cures I stumbled across this vitamin on Amazon. I figured I would give it a shot. Am I glad I did!! This stuff is amazing! After only 2 weeks my acne was almost completely gone!! I couldn't believe! I wish I had known about it years before. When I use this in addition to a dairy free, low sugar diet, the Exposed system skin care, and fish oil supplements I get maximum results. Every other day I apply Alpha Hydroxy Acid cream to my skin to even out skin tone, and it helps with acne too.

title: Best product ever!
body: I have never been the one to have acne as a teen I had the best of the best skin but in the last year due to stress and maybe over sweating from working out 3 and 4 hours a day I started to get pimples all over my forehead and cystic acne on each side of my face, it was horrible and very embarrassing for me. I went to a dermatologist that wanted to charge me an arm in a leg which I couldn't afford. I went online to review people comments on what really worked for them and there were a lot of positive reviews on Zinc and Pantothenic Acid , I was not sure which one to get but I read that some people took them together so I decided to get both I have been taking both for the last 2 weeks I take 5 of the pantothenic and 2 of zinc per day on top of washing my face 2 days a day as you should always do and I also got acne facials to clear out my pores... In the last 2 weeks along all but 1 tiny pimple is dried out and there are no more cystic acne. It has only been 2 weeks!I took pictures to see the changes and boy it is a major difference. I could not be any happier that something worked and it did not break my bank account. I would tell anyone and everyone that is having acne problems to try this because for some acne you have to work on it from inside to the outside.

title: These work well with Kal brand Pantothenic Acid 1000mg Time Release!
body: I have had acne since age 14, & I am now the reverse of that (41 ;-). I've tried a bunch of salicylic-acid, benzoyl-peroxide, topical-antibiotic & tea-tree products but with little success. I've also used oral antibiotics, which I would not recommend due to the havoc they wreak on your intestinal flora. Do NOT use Accutane unless you want birth defects in your future children. What kept my zits down to usually 2 at a time was birth control pills (Ortho Cyclen & Ortho Tri-Cyclen & their generics), but those aren't for everyone. In fact, when I went off the pill 2 years ago, I saw first hand that my acne was hormonal with my lesions gradually increasing over the next year to about 8 at a time & just a few months out from my wedding! Eeeek!

title: MUST HAVE!

I used to catch a cold from someone else even if they looked my way. Everyone should be supplementing with Zinc! Its definitely a year round must have!

title: 1 tablet contains 50mg (333%DV) of zinc gluconate, cellulose, vegetable-source magnesium stearate, silica, and vegetable coating
body: Advantages:  (1)Zinc gluconate is always lower in cadmium than all other forms of zinc supplements.  (2)No copper has been added.  Like iron, manganese, and aluminum, copper is a pro-oxidant that, in excess, will damage every cell in our bodies and increase our risk of death from heart disease, cancer, and a dozen other killer diseases.  (3)The price is affordable.  (4)Absorption is adequate.  Zinc gluconate is not as well-absorbed as zinc monomethionine, chelated zinc, or zinc picolinate but it is absorbed as well or better than all of the remaining zinc choices.

body: This is the zinc supplement you want to buy. You can always rely on NOW products. This is pure zinc glucconate . Other types of zinc supplements can lead to serious kidney damage.. To my understanding, it takes about 3 months for zinc supplements to kick in. Zinc deficiency is tough to track down because it's a mineral. Main signs of zinc deficiency are compromised immune system, diarrhea, hair loss, skin lesions/slow wound healing, impairment of cognitive or motor functions. Other symptoms may include sleep problems, reduced fertility, loss of sex drive, skin/scalp problems, spots on fingernails and mild anemia.

title: Excellent supplement.
body: I've been taking zinc for years and recently switched most of my vitamin brands to NOW brand because the quality is great, especially for the price and very consistent. Western diets are often deficient in zinc as it comes primarily from dark leafy green veggies which you can almost never eat enough of. Having adequate zinc levels is essential for immune function, wound healing, diabetes, mental clarity and memory, growth (especially in children) and especially in prostate issues for males. Males are especially prone to zinc deficiencies as sexual activity in males utilizes massive amounts of zinc necessitating the need for external supplementation for normal levels. It's also critically important in females, especially during child bearing years and to offset chronic disease in old age. (sorry, i study nutrition so sometimes it just comes pouring out.) This particular supplement is easily absorbed and has no unappealing taste or aroma.

title: Reduced chest pains from Angina
body: I've been taking this stuff for 3 weeks now, anywhere from 2 - 4 50mg doses a day.  Immediately I noticed when running my gas powered weed eater before mowing that my chest pains from Angina were nearly gone.  I used to get severe chest pains while weed eating about half way though my lawn and always had to stop until my heart slowed down.  Zinc allows red blood cells to carry more oxygen and that is some of the problem with Angina - pain because of restricted blood or oxygen flow to the heart.  For me Angina attacks are caused by anxiety from physical or emotional stress and chest pains radiate down my arm into my joints and up to my teeth and jaw.  It's quite scary because I was awakened at night with chest pains if I dreamed about running or stressful activity!!

title: Don't take more than one!
body: Three star rating isn't due to the quality of the pills--they seem just fine. But, I have to cut them in half just to take one. One pill is 300% the daily recommendation and, just in case you're like me and didn't know, a zinc overdose will make you incredibly upset to your stomach. I would just go with a zinc tablet that isn't quite so...high in zinc. If you're seriously zinc-deficient, and many people are, these might be just the ticket. For anyone that eats a healthy diet and keeps up on their vitamins/minerals, this will probably be overkill like it was for me.

title: Helps prevent or mitigate cold symptoms
body: I am a fan of zinc because it helps me prevent or get over colds much faster than if I didn't take it.  When I begin to feel a scratchy throat or if I was exposed to someone sick at work then I take one of these after eating a good meal and before bed and I usually wake up fine with no symptoms.  If I am sick already then I take one a day for 3 days and my body can usually get over the cold quickly.

title: Great Zinc, but remember to cycle it!
body: Great zinc. I take a quarter of a tablet. The full and even half the tablet seems to be too much. It caused me nausea, and it lasted many hours. I also recommend cycling with zinc as it inhibits iron absorption and other trace minerals. Here's a excerpt from The Art and Science of Low Carbohydrate Performance by Volek and Phinney. "The connection between iron and zinc is that both are trace minerals that are absorbed by the same mechanism in the small intestine. This means that taking lots of iron for months at a time blocks absorption of zinc, even if there is plenty of zinc in your diet." They recommend to cycle it every 30 days.

title: Excellent supplement.
body: I've been taking zinc for years and recently switched most of my vitamin brands to NOW brand because the quality is great, especially for the price and very consistent. Western diets are often deficient in zinc as it comes primarily from dark leafy green veggies which you can almost never eat enough of. Having adequate zinc levels is essential for immune function, wound healing, diabetes, mental clarity and memory, growth (especially in children) and especially in prostate issues for males. Males are especially prone to zinc deficiencies as sexual activity in males utilizes massive amounts of zinc necessitating the need for external supplementation for normal levels. It's also critically important in females, especially during child bearing years and to offset chronic disease in old age. (sorry, i study nutrition so sometimes it just comes pouring out.) This particular supplement is easily absorbed and has no unappealing taste or aroma.

title: Straight zinc to combat colds!
body: I'm not big on vitamins, and I'm not on any prescriptions - am I freak of American society??  That being said, I take zinc every day, because, whether it's just in my head or not, it seems to help keep some basic illnesses at bay, and when I have been afflicted with the occasional cold, I up my dose, and it seems to shorten the duration and severity of symptoms.  I take straight 50mg of zinc - none of that Cold-eez stuff that has a smaller amount of zinc in it.  It won't hurt you - I've even "OD'd" myself on it during colds and been fine (maybe a little dizzy from taking too much, but you get over it). I think I've had fewer colds since I started taking zinc two years ago.

title: Reduced chest pains from Angina
body: I've been taking this stuff for 3 weeks now, anywhere from 2 - 4 50mg doses a day.  Immediately I noticed when running my gas powered weed eater before mowing that my chest pains from Angina were nearly gone.  I used to get severe chest pains while weed eating about half way though my lawn and always had to stop until my heart slowed down.  Zinc allows red blood cells to carry more oxygen and that is some of the problem with Angina - pain because of restricted blood or oxygen flow to the heart.  For me Angina attacks are caused by anxiety from physical or emotional stress and chest pains radiate down my arm into my joints and up to my teeth and jaw.  It's quite scary because I was awakened at night with chest pains if I dreamed about running or stressful activity!!

I will continue taking 100mg Zinc until my skin is completely clear and this I will drop down to taking 50mg in order to stay clear.

I like the easy open cap on this bottle and the tablets are fairly small and narrow which makes them easy to swallow.

I take this differently though, I break it in half and only take 1/2 pill per day.  I find a whole pill isnt needed.  I put the half pill in my mouth and chew it quickly and swallow that with water fast before the taste gets to me too bad.  I Never have a stomach ache this way either like I used to when taking the whole pill.  Plus I figure that it wont hurt because you leave zinc lozenges in your mouth to dissolve when you are sick and that helps so why shouldnt chewing this up act the same.  Seems logical anyway and I am happy with the results so why ruin a good thing.

title: Best and fastest absorption
body: Gave it to my mother as a supplement since she has diabetes.  Most people that are diabetic have a zinc deficiency.  This leads to hair loss and other issues that most doctors just attribute to normal symptoms of diabetes.  But natural supplements like zinc, apple cider vinegar and cinnamon can help people with diabetes heal naturally versus taking any of these horrible medications that have more side affects than most diseases.  Taking zinc in its liquid form is the best way to 1) find out if you have a deficiency (will taste like water), and 2) for the best and fastest absorption. This brand had the best guarantee of validity, price and shipping.

title: GREAT zinc test and supplement! Won't use anything else.
body: This stuff is really great.  I felt fantastic after 3 days taking it.  I never realized low zinc was a thing until I ordered this and did their taste test.  I couldn't taste it, so I took a teaspoon a day.  It's very fast-acting and easy to take.  If you need it, it tastes like water; if you don't, it taste like fishy pond water (strongly), and it's then ok to spit it out.  Win/win.

title: Many uses
body: Because zinc is an antiviral, I used some on a cotton ball to see if it would get rid of my daughter's wart.  After only 4 applications, her wart was gone.  I told a few other people about this and they had similar results.  Most recently I used it on a HUGE wart on the face of a 103 year old, applying only once a week via cottonball which I held on her wart for about a minute and small pieces of it turned black and fell off until it was completely gone.  I have also used this to ward off sore throats and cold sores.  Amazing suff!

title: Zinc is better than Ambien!!
body: Ok, this worked extremely well.  The unexpected side effect of this was the immediate increase in sleep.  I had no idea zinc was a natural cure for insomnia!!! title: benefits of Zinc
body: I have used this & other brands- see no difference. They all help with leg jerking at night & any myoclonic jerks at any time. Zinc formerly was used as an anti-seizure medication, but in high doses & was associated with constipation. Some find this helps them sleep since they do not have muscle jerks in their sleep. Magnesium would help with any related constipation & also helps with restless leg syndrome.

title: DO NOT take this on an EMPTY  STOMACH
body: I've just started taking this product, so I can't really rate the results yet. But I just wanted to ward others so they don't go through the agony I did. Taking Zinc on an empty stomach is a terrible idea, as I found out through my ignorance. I was almost immediately hit with terrible nausea and stomach pain and cramping. It only lessened when I forced myself to vomit as much of it up as I could about an hour later, but I was still in pain for much of the day. I also am still feeling some pain and nausea days later. Don't do it, kids! Be smarter than I was!
